1.content:
You are Lucian Smith, a 20-year-old scientific prodigy. You have black hair, pale skin, and an average body build.

It’s a bright, clear summer day in your suburban hometown, and lots of people are outside, enjoying the pleasant weather. You, on the other hand, are in your bedroom - which doubles as a personal laboratory for your unusual experiments. Putting the finishing touches on your latest invention (also your ONLY invention), you wipe some sweat from your forehead with a confident smile.

“I’ve finally done it!” you exclaim. “My magnum opus is complete...the Shrink Ring!”

Gently scooping up the metallic ring, you place the artificial jewelry on your right ring finger and tap on the green gem with your left pointer. The result occurs nearly instantly - the world around you quickly enlarges until you stop at a new height of one inch.

“It works!” you cheer. “For once, I created something that actually works!!”

As a precaution, you check to ensure that the ring was downsized with you, and luckily you find it still on your finger. Giving the gem another tap, you find yourself and your little device growing back to normal just as fast as you had shrunk.

Just then, an idea pops into your brain. If you use the ring to become small enough, you could explore a girl’s body on the inside! You always were interested in human anatomy, and now’s a great time to test the limits of your ring-shaped triumph!

But who’s going to be your test subject?

Trina Smith: your 49-year-old mother. She has a nice, toned body and is as caring and loving as a mother can get. She knows of your interest in science, and might be willing to help you with your inner-body experiment...so long as you aren’t hurt.

Alice Smith: your 19-year-old sister. She has a fairly slim build and never excelled in science, but her energetic, positive personality suggest that she might allow you to explore her body.

Emi Thorns: your 21-year-old, Asian girlfriend. She has a slim body, but her gentleness and charm are what really attract you to her. Exploring her body could be fun...

Ms. Goldfinger: your 38-year-old redhead teacher from your days in high school. Tall and serious, she might let you go inside her body...but you’d better keep your trip academic!

(Please run additional characters by me before adding them.)

111.content:
You wandered downstairs, smelling the delicious scent of fresh pancakes. The aroma... was pure heaven!! It was filled with the smell of hot chocolate and whipped cream. Your mom had quite the sweet tooth, so she loved making big Sunday breakfasts. She would often fill her hot pancakes with tons of gooey chocolate chips, and would top them with cool whipped-cream. Many delicious pancakes like these had met their end sliding down your mom's gullet...! (...At least, until they reached HER end...)

As you walked into the kitchen, you saw your mom, Trina, flipping a huge chocolate-chip filled pancake on the stovetop. She turned around, and gave you a big warm smile. "Hiya, sweetie~! *FLIP!* I'm making pancakes for breakfast!" she grinned.

You sat down behind the counter as your mom left the next the next batch of chocolate-chip pancakes sizzle. She grabbed a big plate of hot chocolatey pancakes she had made minutes earlier, and placed it in front of you, smiling gently. She also gave you a big mug of hot chocolate, and poured sweet whipped-cream on both your breakfast and your drink.

"You should eat up, dear!" your mom said. She was smiling, and she was also blushing a little bit. "I heard you masturbating all throughout the morning! You must be super hungry after all that!! Here, eat these to get your energy back, hehe~!" she giggled (in a kindhearted and teasing way), as she pushed the pancakes over to you.

Your face went bright red. "M-Mom!!!" you exclaimed. "I-I wasn't masturbating! I was working on my e-experiments!!" you said truthfully.

Your mom giggled a bit. "Hehe~! Awww, Lucian, you don't need to hide it from me!! All your shaking and excited breathing woke me up earlier, hehe~!" she grinned. "It's healthy for a growing young man like yourself to masturbate, you don't need to be ashamed of enjoying your body~!"

You mumbled something, looking down as you blushed. You figured there was no further point in trying to explain that you were not... er... pleasuring yourself.

*Sniff. Sniff.*

...Right! There were delicious hot pancakes in front of you! You promptly began to chow down on your breakfast. The pancakes... were absolutely delicious!! Their sugary flavor felt sooooo good sliding along your tongue, as you happily munched up a huge mouthful of the chocolaty pancakes. You gulped them down, as your stomach let out a happy growl; Even though you weren't actually masturbating (Eep!), you had still worked up quite the appetite.

Your mom giggled, seeing you enjoy the delicious breakfast. She finished plating up the next batch, as she playfully "stole" a few pancakes off of your plate, drizzling syrup on them as her mouth watered hungrily! "Hehe, I'll get in on this too~!". She dug her fork into the pancakes, and shoved the delicious pieces into her mouth, chewing and sloshing them around on her saliva-filled tongue~!

You expelled a bit of gas through your mouth, and happily sat back, feeling full. Suddenly, you felt excited again, as you remembered about your ring! This was the perfect opportunity! You could show your mom the shrinking process, and ask to explore her body! This was finally your chance!!

...Wait a second. Where... where was your ring?

You felt around on your hand, realizing your ring was missing. You frantically looked around: You must have dropped it while you were enjoying your breakfast!! But your hands were only really near your plate, so...

You gasped, as you looked up at your mother. You saw the golden glint of your ring inside her mouth; It must have fallen on the pancakes! You jumped up to say something, just as...!

**GULP!!!**

Your mother had swallowed your precious ring, along with loads of pancake mush.

"Ahhhh~! " she sighed happily. "Nothing like a good meal, hehe~!"

. . .

15.content:
You look around the streets before you spot a huge crowd of screaming ladies at a rock concert hosted by the one and only Kaede Maple on world tour, you glance at the makeshift stage where the rock-guitarist would be singing loudly into a microphone, along with her backsinger Kayo Regalis.

A white-haired lady called Keliare glanced in your direction before a tawny lady called Seraphine would glare in your direction. Misako also seems to be watching the concert in utter boredom while staring at her watch, meanwhile Steph Tsunade would be complaing of a stomach-ache in the background.

You can choose between all of them:
15.title: Other characters

154.content:
Ultimately, you choose to go inside the body of Steph Tsunade, the slightly-chubby lady with purple glasses, dark hair, and olive skin. She does seem to be suffering from a stomachache...perhaps you could help her out from within her belly?

But it quickly occurs to you that there are other ways to enter Steph’s body. Maybe you could sneak into her ear and check out her brain? Or you could slip into her nose and explore her lungs...

Using your special ring to shrink back down, you decide to get inside Steph through her...
154.title: Steph Tsunade

1541.content:
Seeing Steph Tsunade just sitting there with long black hair and purple glasses, while sipping on some hot green matcha-tea in a clear glass, gives you an idea of some sort... Considering that you'd need to get closer to her, without anyone noticing, and since Steph was awaiting a meal to go with that matcha tea, it was pretty much a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity for once! So no one would notice as a tiny speck flies out and hits the ocean of matcha-tea with a tiny splash...

"Oh, that music's pretty nice, but I've heard better," Steph says softly while sipping casually on her matcha tea, you would note at the high arch of her enormous maw and the fact that Steph has no tonsils, that it was a rather strange sight. You'd have several options here, each of them equally valid.
1541.title: Takin' a deep dive

choices: Stick with Misako the police officer.
155.content:
You consider choosing to explore the body of Misako, but then a thought crosses your mind.

Is exploring a police officer’s body really a good idea?

Yeah, she’s clearly bored out of her mind and exploring her body could potentially bring her out of her funk, and no, you don’t necessarily have to make your presence around her known, but that doesn’t change the fact that you’d be disturbing an officer on duty.

Even if you did go inside of her body with her unaware, you have to also consider the potential repercussions of her finding out that you’re inside of her body. What would happen then? Would you be fined? Would you be put under arrest?

Moral implications aside, there are still several more ladies that could be used for your “Inner-Body” experiment, within this town aside from Misako and the other previously mentioned ladies.

What to do, stay with Misako, or choose someone else? Hmmm....

[Note: This chapter was made because the previous one didn’t have an ‘Other characters’ choice. If you choose to stick with Misako, then please feel free to pretend that this chapter doesn’t exist, if doing so would make it easier to create a starting chapter for her route.]
155.title: Police Line Do Not Cross

info.brief_description: Shrink to an inch in size and explore the insides of people you know.
info.description:
(Original story was created by Darksword, but has since vanished from this site)

Welcome to this reboot of “a Endosomatophilia World”! To put the story in simple terms, you discover a way to shrink down to an inch tall for the sole purpose of exploring the human body from the inside.

Rules:

1. No interaction with male giants or animals.
2. No evil giantesses. Playful/teasing giantesses are fine.
3. Please use good grammar and proper punctuation.
4. Each chapter should be at least a paragraph, except for minor choices. Don’t go crazy with choice chapters, though.
5. The main character can only be killed through digestion.
6. No characters under the age of 18.
7. No explicitly sexual content with family members.

I reserve the right to make adjustments to these rules as needed, as well as delete chapters that greatly violate the rules.

Other than that...enjoy!
